comment: /**  * Create a JCA 1.5 ActivationSpec object based on the given  * {@link JmsActivationSpecConfig} object.  * @param adapter the ResourceAdapter to create an ActivationSpec object for  * @param config the configured object holding common JMS settings  * @return the provider-specific JCA ActivationSpec object,  * representing the same settings  */
code: /**  * Create a JCA 1.5 ActivationSpec object based on the given  * {@link JmsActivationSpecConfig} object.  * @param adapter the ResourceAdapter to create an ActivationSpec object for  * @param config the configured object holding common JMS settings  * @return the provider-specific JCA ActivationSpec object,  * representing the same settings  */ ActivationSpec createActivationSpec(ResourceAdapter adapter, JmsActivationSpecConfig config).
